title: Anglia sacra, sive, Collectio historiarum partim antiquitus, partim recenter scriptarum, de archiepiscopis & episcopis Angliæ, a prima fidei Christianæ susceptione ad annum MDXL
author: Wharton, Henry, 1664-1695.
notes: Armorial bearings of the archbishopric of Canterbury on frontispiece.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.

Pars 1. De archiepiscopis & episcopis ecclesiarum cathedralium, quas monachi possederunt -- Pars 2. Plures antiquas de vitis & rebus gestis praesulum anglicorum historias sine certo ordine congestas complexa.
